meanings.sent1: I found some colorful doodads in the drawer.
meanings.sent2: She always carries around a bag full of doodads.
meanings.sent3: The doodads on the shelf seemed to be having a party.
meanings.sent4: His mind was a treasure trove of doodads waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: The room was filled with an assortment of doodads, each with its own story.

meanings.definition: Something whose name is either forgotten or not known; a gadget or other unspecified thing
meanings.sent1: Can you pass me that doodad over there?
meanings.sent2: He's always tinkering with different doodads in his workshop.
meanings.sent3: The mysterious package turned out to be a doodad from his childhood.
meanings.sent4: Her purse was a bottomless pit of doodads and trinkets.
meanings.sent5: The market was full of vendors selling all sorts of doodads and knickknacks.
